Adult.description: Mourning Doves are much larger than Common Ground-Doves and have a long, tapered tail scalloped in white.

Adult/immature.description: Inca Doves are extensively scaled on the belly, back, and wings; Common Ground-Doves have fine scaling only on the neck and breast. Inca Doves also have longer tails that flash white in flight unlike Common Ground-Doves.
